name: Morse code
instruction:
A table with Morse code for the letters of the English alphabet is given:
```javascript
Символ Код Символ Код Символ Код
A .- J .--- S ...
B -... K -.- T -
C -.-. L .-.. U ..-
D -.. M -- V ...-
E . N -. W .--
F ..-. O --- X -..-
G --. P .--. Y -.--
H .... Q --.- Z --..
I .. R .-.
```

Write a function `codeMorse` that encodes text according to Morse code.

Conditions:
* The function takes as input one parameter - a string consisting of exactly 5 characters;
* The string can only contain letters of the English alphabet, numbers and spaces;
* The case of the letters is irrelevant;
* Spaces contained in the string must be ignored during encoding;
* Digits contained in the string are not encoded and remain in their original form;
* All encoded characters, including digits, in the resulting string must be separated by a single space.

Examples of function triggers:
```javascript
codeMorse('AbC d'); // '.- -... -.-. -..'
сodeMorse('B 747'); // '-... 7 4 7'
codeMorse(' 1 2'); // '1 2'
```
